title.narrative: approved. APPROVAL FLOW EDIT: Shane Stryzinski ADDED by Maha R. Al-Far on Mon Sep 10 09:00:15 EDT 2018 Reason Added: visibility APPROVAL FLOW EDIT: Shane Stryzinski ADDED by Maha R. Al-Far on Mon Sep 03 06:39:07 EDT 2018 Reason Added: Selected Appro. Live Love Local Ambassadors Program for Tourism

description.narrative: Live Love Local Ambassadors Program for Tourism~Information Redacted~[Covers grants (including revenue-sharing), subsidies, gratuities, and other aid for which cash payments are made to states, other political subdivisions, corporations, associations, and individuals; contributions to international societies, commissions, proceedings, or projects, whether in lump sum or as quotas of expenses; contributions fixed by treaty; grants to foreign countries; taxes imposed by taxing authorities where the Federal Government has consented to taxation (excluding the employers share of Federal Insurance Contribution Act taxes); and payments in lieu of taxes. Includes readjustment and other benefits for veterans, other than indemnities for death or disability.]. Live Love Local Ambassadors Program for Tourism [Covers grants (including revenue-sharing), subsidies, gratuities, and other aid for which cash payments are made to states, other political subdivisions, corporations, associations, and individuals; contributions to international societies, commissions, proceedings, or projects, whether in lump sum or as quotas of expenses; contributions fixed by treaty; grants to foreign countries; taxes imposed by taxing authorities where the Federal Government has consented to taxation (excluding the employers share of Federal Insurance Contribution Act taxes); and payments in lieu of taxes. Includes readjustment and other benefits for veterans, other than indemnities for death or disability.]. Live Love Local Ambassadors Program for Tourism [Covers grants (including revenue-sharing), subsidies, gratuities, and other aid for which cash payments are made to states, other political subdivisions, corporations, associations, and individuals; contributions to international societies, commissions, proceedings, or projects, whether in lump sum or as quotas of expenses; contributions fixed by treaty; grants to foreign countries; taxes imposed by taxing authorities where the Federal Government has consented to taxation (excluding the employer’s share of Federal Insurance Contribution Act taxes); and payments in lieu of taxes. Includes readjustment and other benefits for veterans, other than indemnities for death or disability.]

owner-org.narrative: The federal government of the United States

description.narrative: U.S. foreign assistance to Kuwait seeks to support diplomatic efforts and a strategic political-military arrangement designed to counter threats likely to emerge in the volatile Persian Gulf region by funding training opportunities for key Kuwaiti military leaders. (Source: Congressional Budget Justification FY 2011)
